titles.title: A resolution to authorize representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the case of Keyter v. McCain, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 2/16/2006--Passed Senate without amendment. Authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senators Bill Frist, Joseph I. Lieberman, Mitch McConnell, Rick Santorum, and Ted Stevens in the case of Keyter v. McCain, et al.
